attributes.action: implement regulations to prevent employers and recruitment agencies requesting unnecessary personal details and documents from job applicants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The details and documentation required from job applicants by many recruiters amounts to an unconscionable invasion of privacy.

A person's date of birth is unrelated to a their ability to do a job.

Postal address is not needed by most job advertisers because they communicate by email or telephone. 

NI number is only needed when they process payroll, after they have actually employed you.

Nobody interviewing prospective employees needs photocopies of a passport, birth certificate, driving licence, utility bill, examination certificate, etc. These should only be requested from the person who is offered the job.
